quests.desc: Welcome to TextWorld! Here is how to play! First step, recover the book from the table inside the Room A. If you can get your hands on the book, travel east. After that, place the book on the shelf. And then, make an effort to venture west. Following that, take the apple from the table. And then, go to the south. Then, ensure that the refrigerator inside the Room D is open. After that, insert the apple into the refrigerator. After that, recover the icecream from the refrigerator. Having got the icecream, eat the icecream. Got that? Good!

infos.name: Room B
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a Room B. A typical one. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.

 As if things weren't amazing enough already, you can even see a shelf. The shelf is normal.[if there is something on the s_1] On the shelf you can see [a list of things on the s_1]. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this![end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: Room A
infos.desc:
You've entered a Room A. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.

 You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a table. [if there is something on the s_0]On the table you see [a list of things on the s_0]. There's something strange about this being here, but you can't put your finger on it.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]However, the table, like an empty table, has nothing on it.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: Room C
infos.desc:
Well how about that, you are in the place we're calling the Room C.



You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: Room D
infos.desc:
You've entered a Room D.

 You make out [if c_0 is locked]a locked[else if c_0 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] normal looking refrigerator nearby.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The refrigerator contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: refrigerator
infos.desc: The refrigerator looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: icecream
infos.desc: You couldn't pay me to eat that standard thing.

infos.name: apple
infos.desc: You couldn't pay me to eat that typical thing.

objective: I hope you're ready to go into rooms and interact with objects, because you've just entered TextWorld! Here is your task for today. Your first objective is to travel south. And then, doublecheck that the refrigerator is wide open. Then, retrieve the icecream from the refrigerator. With the icecream, eat the icecream. Got that? Good!
